title: Starpokerunion
author: Starpokerunion
content: Dear members,We have joined a union in the pokerbros app Looking for players agents and staking players in tournaments. We are a crypto club with an excellent track record in the online poker scene .We hold daily weekly and monthly poker tournaments .If you would like to join us either as a member or an agent we are available on telegram @Pokernutz . Trust is a key issue in our club and we are offering games and tournaments around the clock. We have very strict rules about how we conduct a fun and fair room.Our policy is all deposits and withdrawals are sent via the same btc to btc , eth to eth and usdt to usdt . All withdrawals are done within a 6 hour time frame. Pros and cons of playing at our club Pros1. Soft field of recreational players2. High rakeback for grinders3. Staking partially good players or fully on tournaments only4. Fast deposits and withdrawals5. 24/7 action tables6. Highest level of security against collusion7. Friendly and professional staffCons1. Rake is a little higher than regular rooms to keep the poker sharks away2. No instant withdrawals like some poker clubs ( up to 6 hours)3. Mobile version only
